description.zh-cn: 法国历史学家对1792年9月到1804年5月间多个共和政体的统称，先后经历了国民公会、督政府和执政府三个时期。
description.en: The conventional term used by French historians for the series of republican governments in France between September 1792 and May 1804. It went through three periods: the National Convention, the Directory, and the Consulate.

description.zh-cn: 18世纪末在法国爆发的资产阶级革命，深刻地改变了法国和欧洲的历史。法兰西第一共和国在此期间成立。
description.en: A bourgeois revolution that broke out in France at the end of the 18th century, profoundly changing the history of France and Europe. The French First Republic was established during this period.

description.zh-cn: 法国波旁王朝国王，在法国大革命中被推翻并被处决。
description.en: King of France from the House of Bourbon, who was overthrown and executed during the French Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 法国军事家、政治家，法兰西第一共和国第一执政，后成为法兰西第一帝国皇帝。
description.en: A French military and political leader who was the First Consul of the French First Republic and later Emperor of the First French Empire.

description.zh-cn: 法兰西第一帝国和法兰西第二帝国的君主头衔。拿破仑被拥为皇帝标志着法兰西第一共和国的结束。
description.en: The monarchical title of the First and Second French Empires. Napoleon's enthronement as emperor marked the end of the French First Republic.

description.zh-cn: 由拿破仑建立的君主制政权，取代了法兰西第一共和国。
description.en: A monarchical regime established by Napoleon, which replaced the French First Republic.

description.zh-cn: 法兰西第一共和国的第一个统治机构，废除了君主制，建立了共和国，并审判了路易十六。
description.en: The first governing body of the French First Republic, which abolished the monarchy, established the republic, and tried Louis XVI.

description.zh-cn: 法兰西第一共和国的第二个统治机构，由五名督政官掌握行政权，后被雾月政变推翻。
description.en: The second governing body of the French First Republic, where executive power was held by five Directors, later overthrown by the Coup of 18 Brumaire.

description.zh-cn: 法兰西第一共和国的最后一个统治机构，由拿破仑·波拿巴作为第一执政掌握实权。
description.en: The final governing body of the French First Republic, where Napoleon Bonaparte held real power as First Consul.

nodes.id: 马克西米连·罗伯斯庇尔

zh-cn: 马克西米连·罗伯斯庇尔

description.zh-cn: 法国大革命时期雅各宾派的领袖，救国委员会的主要成员，在热月政变中被推翻并处决。
description.en: A leader of the Jacobins during the French Revolution, a prominent member of the Committee of Public Safety, overthrown and executed in the Thermidorian Reaction.

description.zh-cn: 法国大革命时期的政治家，督政府时期的主要统治者。
description.en: A French politician during the Revolution and the dominant ruler of the Directory period.

nodes.id: 让-雅克·雷吉斯·德·康巴塞雷斯

zh-cn: 让-雅克·雷吉斯·德·康巴塞雷斯

description.zh-cn: 法国政治家，执政府时期担任第二执政。
description.en: A French statesman who served as the Second Consul during the Consulate.

description.zh-cn: 法国政治家，执政府时期担任第三执政。
description.en: A French statesman who served as the Third Consul during the Consulate.

description.zh-cn: 巴黎市民占领杜伊勒里宫的暴动，导致了法国君主制的最终结束。
description.en: An insurrection where Paris citizens stormed the Tuileries Palace, leading to the final end of the French monarchy.

description.zh-cn: 法国大革命期间的君主立宪制政体，在八月十日事件后被推翻。
description.en: The constitutional monarchy regime during the French Revolution, which was overthrown after the Insurrection of 10 August 1792.

description.zh-cn: 法国大革命中的一段时期，由救国委员会主导，对共和国的敌人进行大规模处决。
description.en: A period during the French Revolution, led by the Committee of Public Safety, characterized by mass executions of enemies of the Republic.

description.zh-cn: 国民公会时期成立的委员会，在雅各宾专政时期掌握实权，推行恐怖统治。
description.en: A committee established during the National Convention period, which held de facto power during the Jacobin Dictatorship and implemented the Reign of Terror.

description.zh-cn: 推翻罗伯斯庇尔及其政治盟友的政变，结束了恐怖统治。
description.en: A coup d'état that overthrew Robespierre and his political allies, ending the Reign of Terror.

description.zh-cn: 由拿破仑·波拿巴发动的军事政变，推翻了督政府，建立了执政府。
description.en: A military coup led by Napoleon Bonaparte that overthrew the Directory and established the Consulate.

description.zh-cn: 法兰西第一共和国的宪法，建立了督政府体制。
description.en: A constitution of the French First Republic that established the Directory system.

description.zh-cn: 法兰西第一共和国的宪法，确立了执政府体制，并授予拿破仑·波拿巴作为第一执政的巨大权力。
description.en: A constitution of the French First Republic that established the Consulate system and granted immense power to Napoleon Bonaparte as First Consul.

description.zh-cn: 法兰西第一共和国的宪法，将政府权力赋予一位世袭皇帝，从而建立了法兰西第一帝国。
description.en: A constitution of the French First Republic that vested government power in a hereditary emperor, thereby establishing the First French Empire.

description.zh-cn: 法国大革命时期的立法机关，位于君主立宪制法兰西王国和国民公会之间。
description.en: The legislature of France during the French Revolution, positioned between the constitutional Kingdom of France and the National Convention.

description.zh-cn: 位于中欧的政治实体，法国在1792年对其宣战。
description.en: A political entity in Central Europe against which France declared war in 1792.

nodes.id: 卡尔·威廉·斐迪南 (不伦瑞克-沃尔芬比特尔)

zh-cn: 卡尔·威廉·斐迪南 (不伦瑞克-沃尔芬比特尔)
en: Charles William Ferdinand, Duke of Brunswick

description.zh-cn: 普鲁士陆军元帅，普奥联军将军，曾发表《布伦瑞克宣言》威胁巴黎。
description.en: A Prussian field marshal and general of the Austro-Prussian army who issued the Brunswick Manifesto threatening Paris.

description.zh-cn: 由布伦瑞克公爵发表的宣言，威胁称如果法国王室受到伤害，普奥联军将摧毁巴黎。
description.en: A proclamation issued by the Duke of Brunswick, threatening the destruction of Paris by the Austro-Prussian army if the French royal family were harmed.

description.zh-cn: 法国国王路易十六的王后，在法国大革命期间被审判和处决。
description.en: The Queen of France and wife of King Louis XVI, who was tried and executed during the French Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 法国大革命期间发生的一系列针对囚犯的大屠杀事件。
description.en: A series of mass killings of prisoners that took place during the French Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 由国民公会颁布的宪法，引入了普选制，但从未被实施。
description.en: A constitution enacted by the National Convention that introduced universal suffrage but was never implemented.

description.zh-cn: 法国大革命时期最著名和最有影响力的政治俱乐部，在热月政变后被解散。
description.en: The most famous and influential political club during the French Revolution, which was disbanded after the Thermidorian Reaction.

description.zh-cn: 法国大革命时期的一个政治派别，在热月政变后其幸存者重新掌权。
description.en: A political faction during the French Revolution whose survivors regained power after the Thermidorian Reaction.

nodes.id: 埃马纽埃尔-约瑟夫·西哀士

zh-cn: 埃马纽埃尔-约瑟夫·西哀士

description.zh-cn: 法国大革命时期的理论家和政治家，雾月政变后成为临时执政官。
description.en: A theorist and politician during the French Revolution who became a provisional consul after the Coup of 18 Brumaire.

description.zh-cn: 法国政治家，雾月政变后成为临时执政官。
description.en: A French politician who became a provisional consul after the Coup of 18 Brumaire.

description.zh-cn: 法国的中央银行，成立于执政府时期。
description.en: The central bank of France, founded during the Consulate period.

description.zh-cn: 罗马天主教会教宗，与拿破仑谈判并签署了《1801年教务专约》。
description.en: Pope of the Roman Catholic Church who negotiated and signed the Concordat of 1801 with Napoleon.

description.zh-cn: 拿破仑·波拿巴与教宗庇护七世签订的协议，旨在恢复天主教在法国的地位。
description.en: An agreement between Napoleon Bonaparte and Pope Pius VII, seeking to restore the status of the Catholic Church in France.

description.zh-cn: 全球最大的基督教教会，通过《1801年教务专约》在法兰西共和国内恢复活动。
description.en: The largest Christian church in the world, which resumed its activities within the French Republic through the Concordat of 1801.

description.zh-cn: 执政府时期设立的四个议事机构之一，负责维护宪法和任命议员等。
description.en: One of the four deliberative bodies established during the Consulate, responsible for upholding the constitution and appointing members of the legislature, among other duties.

description.zh-cn: 法兰西第一共和国的宪法，授予拿破仑终身执政官地位并增加了参议院的权力。
description.en: A constitution of the French First Republic that granted Napoleon the position of Consul for Life and increased the power of the Sénat conservateur.

description.zh-cn: 执政府时期设立的议事机构之一，负责在法案通过前对其进行评议。
description.en: One of the deliberative bodies established during the Consulate, responsible for discussing legislative drafts before their passage.

description.zh-cn: 法兰西第一共和国在法国大革命期间成立。
description.en: The French First Republic was established during the French Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 八月十日事件中的暴动呼吁结束君主制，最终导致了君主制的终结。
description.en: The insurrection on August 10 called for the end of the monarchy, ultimately leading to its demise.

description.zh-cn: 国民公会废除了君主立宪制，建立了共和国。
description.en: The National Convention abolished the constitutional monarchy and established the Republic.

description.zh-cn: 国民公会审判路易十六犯有重叛逆罪，并将其送上断头台处决。
description.en: The National Convention tried Louis XVI for high treason and had him executed by guillotine.

description.zh-cn: 法兰西第一帝国的成立取代并终结了法兰西第一共和国。
description.en: The establishment of the First French Empire replaced and ended the French First Republic.

description.zh-cn: 拿破仑被拥为法兰西皇帝。
description.en: Napoleon was proclaimed Emperor of the French.

relationships.source: 马克西米连·罗伯斯庇尔

description.zh-cn: 罗伯斯庇尔曾担任国民公会主席。
description.en: Robespierre served as President of the National Convention.

description.zh-cn: 保罗·巴拉斯是督政府时期的主要统治者。
description.en: Paul Barras was the dominant ruler during the Directory period.

relationships.source: 让-雅克·雷吉斯·德·康巴塞雷斯

description.zh-cn: 救国委员会制定并推行了恐怖政策，将共和国的敌人送上断头台。
description.en: The Committee of Public Safety devised and implemented a policy of terror, sending enemies of the Republic to the guillotine.

relationships.target: 马克西米连·罗伯斯庇尔

description.zh-cn: 热月政变导致罗伯斯庇尔倒台并被处决。
description.en: The Thermidorian Reaction led to the downfall and execution of Robespierre.

description.zh-cn: 热月政变结束了雅各宾专政，即恐怖统治。
description.en: The Thermidorian Reaction ended the Jacobin Dictatorship, also known as the Reign of Terror.

description.zh-cn: 督政府是依据《共和三年宪法》建立的。
description.en: The Directory was established according to the Constitution of the Year III.

description.zh-cn: 拿破仑发动的雾月政变结束了督政府的统治。
description.en: The Coup of 18 Brumaire, led by Napoleon, ended the rule of the Directory.

description.zh-cn: 执政府始于雾月政变。
description.en: The Consulate began with the Coup of 18 Brumaire.

description.zh-cn: 《共和八年宪法》使执政府的统治合法化，并加强了行政权。
description.en: The Constitution of the Year VIII legitimized the rule of the Consulate and strengthened its executive power.

description.zh-cn: 《共和十二年宪法》将法兰西第一共和国政府交付给一位世袭的皇帝，从而建立了法兰西第一帝国。
description.en: The Constitution of the Year XII delivered the government of the French First Republic to a hereditary emperor, thus establishing the First French Empire.

description.zh-cn: 国民立法议会单方面地对神圣罗马帝国宣战。
description.en: The Legislative Assembly unilaterally declared war on the Holy Roman Empire.

relationships.source: 卡尔·威廉·斐迪南 (不伦瑞克-沃尔芬比特尔)

description.zh-cn: 该宣言威胁如果法国王室受到伤害将摧毁巴黎，但这反而加剧了法国的政治动荡和对反革命国家的不满。
description.en: The manifesto threatened to destroy Paris if the French royal family were harmed, but it instead intensified political turmoil in France and increased animosity towards counter-revolutionary European states.

description.zh-cn: 法国王后玛丽·安托瓦内特在恐怖统治时期被审判并处决。
description.en: Queen Marie Antoinette was tried and executed during the Reign of Terror.

description.zh-cn: 随着罗伯斯庇尔的倒台，雅各宾俱乐部被解散。
description.en: Following the fall of Robespierre, the Jacobin Club was dissolved.

description.zh-cn: 热月政变后，吉伦特派的幸存者再次掌权。
description.en: After the Thermidorian Reaction, the surviving Girondins returned to power.

relationships.target: 埃马纽埃尔-约瑟夫·西哀士

description.zh-cn: 在雾月政变后共同担任临时执政官。
description.en: Served together as provisional consuls after the Coup of 18 Brumaire.

description.zh-cn: 在雾月政变后共同担任临时执政官。
description.en: Served together as provisional consuls after the Coup of 18 Brumaire.

description.zh-cn: 拿破仑与教宗庇护七世就《1801年教务专约》进行了谈判。
description.en: Napoleon negotiated the Concordat of 1801 with Pope Pius VII.

description.zh-cn: 该协议允许罗马天主教会自1802年起在法兰西共和国内重新出现。
description.en: This agreement allowed the Roman Catholic Church to re-emerge in the French Republic from 1802.

description.zh-cn: 通过参议院法令授予了拿破仑终身执政官的地位。
description.en: Granted Napoleon the status of Consul for Life via a Sénatus-consulte.

description.zh-cn: 《共和十年宪法》将法案评议委员会的人数从100人减少为50人。
description.en: The Constitution of the Year X reduced the number of members in the Tribunat from 100 to 50.

description.zh-cn: 《共和十年宪法》增加了参议院的立法权。
description.en: The Constitution of the Year X increased the legislative power of the Sénat conservateur.
